snippet: The Pop artist Robert Indiana, best known for his "LOVE" sculptures, in which the letters "L" and a tilted "O" rest above the letters "V" and "E," is being sued by Joao Tovar, a Monaco-based collector who says the artist renounced a sculpture that...
abstract: The Pop artist Robert Indiana, best known for his "LOVE" sculptures, in which the letters "L" and a tilted "O" rest above the letters "V" and "E," is being sued by Joao Tovar, a Monaco-based collector who says the artist renounced a sculpture that Mr. Tovar bought after first certifying it was authentic, according to The Bangor Daily News.

headline.main: Robert Indiana Sued Over a Question of False "Love"
headline.print_headline: Collector From Monaco Sues Robert Indiana
